description:
This course is about learning WordPress. You'll learn all the basic tools you need in order to create and fully customize as well as optimize a WordPress website.

You'll learn a lot and along the way we'll be there to help guide you through the process of learning WordPress, A-Z.

At the end of this course you'll have learned how to use many developmental tools which are required in order to be a WordPress developer. 

The course is structured in a series of videos in which we guide you step by step through the process. It'll be a chance for you to show the world what you're made of.
title: Build a Portfolio Website with WordPress
